name: inauguration
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of officially putting someone into an important position, or the ceremony at which this is done: He watched the inauguration of his country's new president. When is the inauguration? an inauguration ceremony
the act of something officially starting to be used: In 1900 Paris saw the inauguration of the Metro.
the beginning of a new period, style, or activity: It was the inauguration of a new era in American life.
More examplesFewer examplesPresident-elect Jefferson actually arrived on foot for his inauguration on March 4, 1801.He wrote a poem for the mayor's inauguration.The Foundation announced the inauguration of a Charity Fund.the inauguration of a year-long festival of cultural eventsThe inauguration of the space station as a working lab was a turning point for science in space.
